professional_summary: IT Security Analyst with expertise in NIST compliance, federal security systems, and comprehensive IT security analysis.

key_responsibilities: Conduct kick off meetings to collect systems information and categorize them based on NIST standards.
Perform risk assessments and develop security plans for federal systems.
Review and update documents such as Standard Operating Procedures (SOPs) and Security Incident Reports (SIRs).
Develop security control test plans and conduct NIST-compliant assessments.
Update various documentation including Risk Assessments (RA) and Incident Response Plans (IRPs).
Create templates for security processes and procedures.
Implement and maintain Oracle databases for organizational use.
Perform regular backups using Oracle tools like datapump and RMAN.
Assist developers with database schema changes and queries.

tools_and_software:
Oracle Tools",
            "Microsoft Office Suite",
            "Security Testing Tools",
            "Database Management Systems
